root.lblClickMap: Click the map to place the crater...
root.lbCrater: Crater is too small to be seen
root.projectile1: The projectile lands intact, with a velocity
root.projectile2: The energy lost in the atmosphere is
root.projectile3: The projectile begins to breakup at an altitude of
root.projectile4: The velocity of the projectile fragments after the burst is
root.projectile5: The energy of the airburst is
root.projectile6: Large fragments strike the surface and may create a crater strewn field. A more careful treatment of atmospheric entry is required to accurately estimate the size-frequency distribution of meteoroid fragments and predict the number and size of craters formed.
root.projectile7: The projectile reaches the ground in a broken condition. The mass of the projectile strikes the surface at a velocity of
root.expos2: Much of the body suffers third degree burns
root.expos3: Much of the body suffers second degree burns
root.expos4: Much of the body suffers first degree burns
root.opress2: Multistory wall-bearing buildings will experience severe cracking and interior partitions will be blown down
root.opress3: Wood frame buildings will almost completely collapse
root.opress4: Interior partitions of wood frame buildings will be blown down. Roof will be severely damaged
root.opress5: Multistory steel-framed office-type buildings will suffer extreme frame distortion, incipient collapse
root.opress7: Bridges will suffer substantial distortion of bracing
root.opress10: Cars and trucks will be largely displaced and grossly distorted and will require rebuilding before use
root.opress11: Cars and trucks will be overturned and displaced, requiring major repairs
root.opress12: No significant damage from atmospheric blast wave
root.opress13: Up to 90 percent of trees blown down; remainder stripped of branches and leaves
root.opress14: About 30 percent of trees blown down; remainder have some branches and leaves blown off
root.incrater: You are standing inside the crater
root.help_text: Supply and select a value for each input field then press submit.
root.help_text2: To clear the entered values press reset.
root.brz_warn: Your internet browser does not support the HTML5 features required for Crater Impact. Consider installing one of the following bowsers.
